name: The Cycle (itch) (Adrien Delahaye, isThisNameFree, Zarnes, gjkmop, AnthonyBouraba)
name_original: The Cycle (itch) (Adrien Delahaye, isThisNameFree, Zarnes, gjkmop, AnthonyBouraba)
description:
The cycle keeps on going until only one player is left. Trust no one.

- 2 to 4 players are needed to play. You are stuck in a house with the other player, during the day find tools and masks to acess safe zones. When the night comes, a monster will start hunting you. This day - night cycle will not end until one player is left.

THE TEAM DESIGN
  • GAME DESIGNER - Aurore Bury
  • GAME DESIGNER - Adrien Delahaye
PROGRAMMING

  • GAME DEVELOPER - Pierre Bailly
